css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-8a7595cc-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);width:calc(58.5% - 1.25%);flex-basis:calc(58.5% - 1.25%);min-width:initial;justify-content:center;flex-direction:column;}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-8a7595cc-u{width:calc(50% - 1.25%);flex-basis:calc(50% - 1.25%);}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-8a7595cc-u{width:100%;flex-basis:100%;}}
